revised_title: Ludwig Jost: A Notable Figure in the Development of Plant Physiology
tldr: Ludwig Jost, a prominent figure in plant physiology, made significant contributions to the field through his experimental work and critical reviews. He was known for his textbook of plant physiology, which was widely used and respected. Jost's dedication to filling gaps in knowledge and his influence on younger botanists made him a respected and admired figure in the scientific community.
